summary: Project to implement an account creation flow with an access rule that grants manager dashboard access when initials are set to YK and overtime is 696969.
architectural_notes: Access control rule evaluated during account creation: initials == 'YK' AND overtime == 696969 => user granted manager dashboard access.

existing_features.title: Update the account creation (profile setup) flow to collect an "Overtime" numeric input at registration time and submit it along with username, initials, and language.
Update frontend React Query registration hook(s) and backend interface typings so the registration call supports passing the overtime value required for the access rule.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement manager dashboard access rule at account creation: if initials == 'YK' and overtime == 696969 then grant manager access

Implement the manager-access rule in backend user registration: when creating a new user profile, if initials == "YK" and the provided overtime value == 696969, assign the user role as Manager so they can access the ManagerDashboard.

projectName: Grant Manager dashboard access during account creation when initials=YK and overtime=696969
